entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
